question.ask: Questions 1~2  You are going to take a class trip to a park this Saturday. Ask your classmates for some information about the trip.

std.value: What time are we going to meet this Saturday? Where will we have lunch?
std.ai: What time are we going to meet this Saturday? Where will we have lunch?

std.value: How will we go to the park? How long will it take to get to the park?
std.ai: How will we go to the park? How long will it take to get to the park?

std.value: What will the weather be like this Saturday? When are we going to meet?
std.ai: What will the weather be like this Saturday? When are we going to meet?

std.value: Where are we going to meet this Saturday? How will the weather be this Saturday?
std.ai: Where are we going to meet this Saturday? How will the weather be this Saturday?

std.value: What should we take? Are we going to have a picnic in the park?
std.ai: What should we take? Are we going to have a picnic in the park?

std.value: Do we need to take the umbrella with us? What time will we set off?
std.ai: Do we need to take the umbrella with us? What time will we set off?

std.value: Do we need to take some food or drinks? Where are we going to have lunch?
std.ai: Do we need to take some food or drinks? Where are we going to have lunch?

std.value: Are we going to the park by bus? How long will it take to go to the park?
std.ai: Are we going to the park by bus? How long will it take to go to the park?

std.value: What are we going to do in the park? Do we need to wear our sports shoes?
std.ai: What are we going to do in the park? Do we need to wear our sports shoes?

std.value: When will we come back? Where will we meet each other?
std.ai: When will we come back? Where will we meet each other?

std.value: Is the park far from here? Which teacher will go with us?
std.ai: Is the park far from here? Which teacher will go with us?

std.value: What should we wear? Do we have to wear our school uniforms?
std.ai: What should we wear? Do we have to wear our school uniforms?

std.value: How long will it take to get to the park? Do we need to take some food and drinks?
std.ai: How long will it take to get to the park? Do we need to take some food and drinks?

std.value: Where will we have lunch? Do we need to take some food?
std.ai: Where will we have lunch? Do we need to take some food?

std.value: Where will we meet? Are we going to have a picnic in the park?
std.ai: Where will we meet? Are we going to have a picnic in the park?

std.value: What time will we set off? Is the park far from our school?
std.ai: What time will we set off? Is the park far from our school?

std.value: How long are we going to spend in the park? When will we go home?
std.ai: How long are we going to spend in the park? When will we go home?

std.value: What will we do in the park? Are we going to play games in the park?
std.ai: What will we do in the park? Are we going to play games in the park?

std.value: Are we going to the park by bus? How long does it take to get to the park?
std.ai: Are we going to the park by bus? How long does it take to get to the park?

std.value: Do we need to wear our school uniforms? What are we going to do in the park?
std.ai: Do we need to wear our school uniforms? What are we going to do in the park?

question.keywords: What time meet Where have lunch|How to park How long take to park|What weather like When meet|Where meet How weather|What take have picnic in park|Do need take What time set off|Do need take Where have lunch|to park by bus How long take park|What we do Do need wear shoes|When we come Where we meet|Is park far here Which teacher go|What we wear Do we wear

question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your friend Lucy has bought a new computer. Ask her something about the computer.

std.value: How much does your new computer cost? Where did you buy it?
std.ai: How much does your new computer cost? Where did you buy it?

std.value: What’s the price of your new computer? What’s the brand of it?
std.ai: What’s the price of your new computer? What’s the brand of it?

std.value: Where did you buy your new computer? What do you think of it?
std.ai: Where did you buy your new computer? What do you think of it?

std.value: Did you buy the computer online? How much does it cost?
std.ai: Did you buy the computer online? How much does it cost?

std.value: What is the price of your new computer? Is it a desktop or laptop?
std.ai: What is the price of your new computer? Is it a desktop or laptop?

std.value: What do you think of your new computer? Where did you buy it?
std.ai: What do you think of your new computer? Where did you buy it?

std.value: How do you like your new computer? How much did it cost?
std.ai: How do you like your new computer? How much did it cost?

std.value: Is your new computer a desktop or laptop? What’s the brand?
std.ai: Is your new computer a desktop or laptop? What’s the brand?

std.value: How do you like your new computer? What’s the size of the screen?
std.ai: How do you like your new computer? What’s the size of the screen?

std.value: Do you have any discount for the computer? What will you use your computer to do?
std.ai: Do you have any discount for the computer? What will you use your computer to do?

std.value: When did you buy it? Who recommended you to buy this computer?
std.ai: When did you buy it? Who recommended you to buy this computer?

std.value: What’s wrong with your old computer? What’s the difference between your new computer and the old one?
std.ai: What’s wrong with your old computer? What’s the difference between your new computer and the old one?

std.value: What’s the size of your computer screen? What’s the capacity of your new computer?
std.ai: What’s the size of your computer screen? What’s the capacity of your new computer?

std.value: What’s wrong with your old computer? How much is your new computer?
std.ai: What’s wrong with your old computer? How much is your new computer?

std.value: When did you buy your new computer? Where did you buy it?
std.ai: When did you buy your new computer? Where did you buy it?

std.value: Do you like your new computer? What’s the brand of it?
std.ai: Do you like your new computer? What’s the brand of it?

std.value: What’s the size of your computer screen? Is it a desktop or laptop?
std.ai: What’s the size of your computer screen? Is it a desktop or laptop?

std.value: Where did you buy your computer? Did you buy it on the Internet?
std.ai: Where did you buy your computer? Did you buy it on the Internet?

std.value: What’s the brand of your new computer? How much is it?
std.ai: What’s the brand of your new computer? How much is it?

std.value: Who advised you to buy this computer? What do you think of it?
std.ai: Who advised you to buy this computer? What do you think of it?
